segments.text: I'm going to the park to play baseball with the guys .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you promised to play chess with me this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but that was before the guys ask me to join the team .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know how much I want to be on the team , and now there is an opening for me.If I don't go to practise today.They ' ll get someone else and I'll miss my chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't care about baseball.You know I need to practice for the chess championship and you promised to help with me if I washed the dishes for you last Sunday , and I did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And then , it'll be dinner time , then homework , and then your Show is on.You are going to break your promise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I won't . I'm going to skip TV tonight and work on your chess game with you if that's ok with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'd rather do it the way we set up.But if you promise to give me your best game , it's ok with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , I'll play as hard as I can and give you an extra game to say thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
